questions.text: What is the primary objective of the project?

questions.instruction: Give me this as a bulleted list with sub items broken out.

questions.text: What are the success criteria for the project?

questions: What tasks need to be completed?
What are the specific requirements and constraints?
Are there any assumptions or exclusions?
What are the specific deliverables and their descriptions?
What are the deadlines for each deliverable?
What are the acceptance criteria for each deliverable?
What is the project start date?
What is the project end date?
What are the major milestones and their deadlines?
Who are the key stakeholders?
What are the roles and responsibilities of each team member?
Are there any third-party vendors or partners involved?
What is the total budget for the project?
How will payments be structured (e.g., fixed Fee price, Fixed Fee Milestones, or time and materials)?
What are the payment milestones?
What project management methodology will be used?
How will progress be tracked and reported?
What tools and software will be used for project management and communication?
What are the potential risks and their mitigation strategies?
Who is responsible for managing risks?
Are there any legal or regulatory requirements that need to be addressed?
What are the confidentiality and non-disclosure requirements?
Will there be any post-project support or maintenance required?
What are the terms for post-project support?
Are there any dependencies on other projects or external factors?
What constraints could impact the project?
